mapper.sql: eprop.id AS eprop_id,eprop.purchase_receive_order_id AS eprop_purchaseReceiveOrderId,eprop.purchase_order_product_id AS eprop_purchaseOrderProductId,eprop.purchase_delivery_order_product_id AS eprop_purchaseDeliveryOrderProductId,eprop.product_id AS eprop_productId,eprop.product_sku_id AS eprop_productSkuId,eprop.product_name AS eprop_productName,eprop.product_snapshot AS eprop_productSnapshot,eprop.product_count AS eprop_productCount,eprop.real_product_id AS eprop_realProductId,eprop.real_product_name AS eprop_realProductName,eprop.real_product_sku_id AS eprop_realProductSkuId,eprop.real_product_snapshot AS eprop_realProductSnapshot,eprop.real_product_count AS eprop_realProductCount,eprop.is_src AS eprop_isSrc,eprop.data_status AS eprop_dataStatus,eprop.remark AS eprop_remark,eprop.create_time AS eprop_createTime,eprop.create_user AS eprop_createUser,eprop.update_time AS eprop_updateUser,eprop.update_user AS eprop_updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT FROM erp_purchase_receive_order epro WHERE epro.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND epro.data_status = 1

SELECT , FROM ( SELECT FROM erp_purchase_receive_order epro WHERE epro.purchase_receive_no = #{purchaseReceiveNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND epro.data_status = 1 ) epro LEFT JOIN erp_purchase_receive_order_product eprop ON eprop.purchase_receive_order_id = epro.id AND eprop.data_status = 1

SELECT , FROM ( SELECT FROM erp_purchase_receive_order epro WHERE epro.purchase_order_id = #{purchaseOrderId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND epro.data_status = 1 ) epro LEFT JOIN erp_purchase_receive_order_product eprop ON eprop.purchase_receive_order_id = epro.id AND eprop.data_status = 1

SELECT , FROM ( SELECT FROM erp_purchase_receive_order epro WHERE epro.purchase_receive_no = #{purchaseReceiveNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND epro.data_status = 1 ) epro LEFT JOIN erp_purchase_receive_order_product eprop ON eprop.purchase_receive_order_id = epro.id

SELECT , FROM ( SELECT FROM erp_purchase_receive_order epro WHERE epro.auto_allot_no = #{autoAllotNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND epro.data_status = 1 AND auto_allot_status=1 ) epro LEFT JOIN erp_purchase_receive_order_product eprop ON eprop.purchase_receive_order_id = epro.id

SELECT count(epro.id) FROM erp_purchase_receive_order epro
AND epro.data_status = 1
